item.title: You Won't Believe What Happens When This Kid Tries a Home Alone Electric Shock Prank!
item.description: Introduction Have you ever seen the classic movie Home Alone where Macaulay Culkin sets up an electric shock prank on the two burglars? Well, this kid decided to try it out for himself and the results were hilarious! Set Up To set up the prank, the kid gathered a few materials. He needed a door, a battery, some wires, a light bulb, and a few other items. After gathering the materials, he set up the prank by connecting the wires to the battery and the door handle.
